name: TheRoosterFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Rooster Flash Briefing, from Rooster Strategic Solutions, discusses the latest in digital media, marketing and technology. It focuses on topics such as social media, programmatic advertising, voice assistants, AI, blockchain, chatbots and more. Primarily, the topics covered will be discussed in relation to how brands, publishers and agencies can best take advantage of the tools. Rooster Strategic Solutions is a consultancy firm serving companies in food and agriculture.

This flash briefing was created by Witlingo. If you would like your own flash briefing, send an email to contact@witlingo.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
